title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Meet the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree — a simple, cozy place for your cat to rest, scratch, and play.

Easy to understand:
- What it is: A 2‑in‑1 cat condo and scratching post. Your cat can nap inside and scratch the post to protect your furniture.
- Soft and comfy: Covered in thick, skin‑friendly plush and soft carpet so it feels gentle on paws and fur.
- Safe and steady: Designed to reduce tipping and wobbling. For best safety, place it on a flat floor, right up against a wall.
- Fun for your cat: Comes with a hanging ball for play and a strong sisal scratching post. Good for kittens or one medium cat.
- Looks nice at home: Leaf accents make it look like a small indoor plant, fitting easily with your décor.
- Quick setup: Easy to assemble in 1–8 minutes. Tools and instructions are included.

Size and details:
- Overall size: 11 inches long x 15 inches wide x 41 inches high.
- Weight: 6 pounds (light enough to move, sturdy enough for daily use).
- Colors: Grey, Beige, or Green.
- In the box: 1 Cat Tree, 1 Instruction Sheet, 1 Set of Tools.

Helpful notes:
- Please check the size to make sure it fits your space and your cat.
- For safety, do not let children play with the cat tree.
- If you need help, friendly customer service is available and happy to assist.

Give your cat a soft, safe spot to sleep and play, without fuss or complicated setup. The TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree is a comfortable choice for both you and your pet.
